name: Hit That Sprite
description:
Note.- Recommend playing in FireFox.

Description:

Blow up everything fly!

Do not let the team Rocket Man explode your balloons , but not get enough munition to defeat them. Liquidate the Phantom, the Beehive, the Frog, the BallMan and Rocket Man in order to get more time and collect all stars and possible balloons.

Use whole arsenal against Rocket Man Team. Be fast and point well to be the best 'Hit That Sprite' !!!

Use your LIGHTSABER, space BAZOOKA, or ...
